item.title: 交易员减少对英国央行减息的押注，英镑在英国通胀后攀升
item.description: 在数据显示英国4月份通胀增幅超过预期之后，交易员们减少了对英国央行进一步降息的押注，英镑兑美元汇率因此创下三年来的新高。【原文：Traders pared bets on further interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England, sending the pound to a three-year high versus the dollar, after data showed UK inflation rose more than expected in April.】

item.title: 房东 GPE 预计供应短缺将导致租金上涨
item.description: 房东 Great Portland Estates Plc 预计，明年伦敦写字楼租金将飙升，因为新开发项目短缺，而对最佳新办公空间的需求强劲。【原文：Landlord Great Portland Estates Plc expects London office rents to surge next year as a shortage of new development collides with robust demand for the best new space.】

item.title: 国际能源署称：关键矿产遭受痛苦破坏的风险更高
item.description: 国际能源机构的一份报告指出，由于关键矿产高度集中在少数几个国家，而且出口限制不断扩大，这些矿产遭受 "痛苦破坏 "的风险与日俱增。【原文：Critical minerals are at increasing risk of “painful disruption” due to their higher concentration in a handful of countries and the spread of export restrictions, according to a report from the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 据说钱德拉-阿斯利将为公司的首次公开募股寻求 10 亿美元的估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Chandra Asri Pacific 公司的基础设施投资部门计划在印尼首次公开募股，寻求至少 10 亿美元的估值。【原文：Chandra Asri Pacific’s infrastructure investment unit is seeking a valuation of at least $1 billion in its planned initial public offering in Indonesia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马莎百货称网络攻击将导致企业损失 3 亿英镑
item.description: 由于一个月前遭受网络攻击，玛莎集团（Marks & Spencer Group Plc）本财年的营业利润将面临 3 亿英镑（4.03 亿美元）的损失。【原文：Marks & Spencer Group Plc is facing a £300 million ($403 million) hit to operating profit this fiscal year from a cyber attack it suffered a month ago.】

item.title: 全球投资、加密货币和人工智能成为卡塔尔经济论坛的首要议题
英国通胀飙升促使交易员减少对英国央行减息的押注
item.description: 由于家庭受到一系列物价上涨的冲击，英国通胀率跃升至一年多来的最高点，超过了预期，这促使投资者减少了对英格兰银行降息的押注。【原文：UK inflation jumped more than forecast to its highest rate in over a year as households were hit by a raft of price increases, prompting investors to pare bets on rate cuts from the Bank of England.】

item.title: 阿联酋发布 "猎鹰 "阿拉伯语人工智能模型，以超越中东竞争对手
item.description: 阿布扎比政府的一个研究机构发布了一个功能强大的新阿拉伯语人工智能模型，以保持其在中东地区对竞争对手的技术领先优势。【原文：A research arm of the Abu Dhabi government has released a powerful new Arabic-language artificial intelligence model in a bid to preserve its technological lead over rivals in the Middle East.】

item.title: 印尼国家矿业公司 Antam 寻求 5 亿美元银团贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼矿商 Aneka Tambang Tbk（又称 Antam）正在寻求 5 亿美元的贷款，这将是印尼今年第一笔来自国有企业的银团美元借款。【原文：Indonesian miner Aneka Tambang Tbk, better known as Antam, is seeking a $500 million loan, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the country’s first syndicated dollar borrowing from a state-owned enterprise this year.】

item.title: 埃森哲推迟六个月后晋升五万名员工
item.description: 埃森哲公司（Accenture Plc）将于 6 月份在全球范围内提拔近 50,000 名员工，在推迟六个月以应对咨询服务需求下滑之后，该公司正试图鼓舞士气。【原文：Accenture Plc will promote almost 50,000 people worldwide in June as the company tries to boost morale after a six-month delay to weather a slump in demand for consulting services.】

item.title: 受套利诱惑，港元跌至弱势区间末端
item.description: 由于本地利率下滑鼓励交易商增加借入港元为套利交易提供资金，港元接近其交易区间的疲软端。【原文：The Hong Kong dollar edged closer to the weak end of its trading range as sliding local interest rates encouraged traders to increase their borrowing of the currency to fund carry trades.】

item.title: 七国集团会议召开，预算赤字成焦点，美元延续跌势
item.description: 由于交易商关注七国集团会议，寻找特朗普政府寻求美元走软的任何迹象，衡量美元的指标跌至两周低点。【原文：A gauge of the dollar fell to a two-week low as traders focused on the Group-of-7 meeting for any signs that the Trump administration is seeking a weaker US dollar.】

item.title: Theta Capital 获得 1.75 亿美元加密货币基金投资
item.description: 加密货币投资公司 Theta Capital Management 完成了超过 1.75 亿美元的基金募集，该基金将支持早期区块链初创企业的机构投资者。【原文：Crypto investment firm Theta Capital Management closed a raise of more than $175 million for a fund-of-funds that will back institutional investors in early-stage blockchain startups.】

item.title: 恒瑞医药 13 亿美元香港上市定价最高
item.description: 江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司的港股发行定价为市场定价区间的最高价，拟募集资金 99 亿港元（合 13 亿美元）。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. priced its Hong Kong stock offering at the top of the marketed range to raise HK$9.9 billion ($1.3 billion).】

item.title: 瑞典初创企业 Einride 在推进首次公开募股前调整管理层
item.description: 瑞典无人驾驶卡车初创公司 Einride AB 正在调整高层管理人员，为可能的首次公开募股奠定基础。【原文：Einride AB is shaking up its top management as the Swedish driverless truck startup lays the groundwork for a possible initial public offering.】

item.title: 软银寻求瑞穗、SMBC 和摩根大通牵头提供 150 亿美元贷款
item.description: 软银集团公司在人工智能领域的投资将通过瑞穗银行（Mizuho Bank Ltd.）、三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp）和摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s investments in AI will be financed through a loan in which Mizuho Bank Ltd., Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. serve as lead underwriters — a sign of the Japanese tech investor’s ability to secure financing for its outsized ambitions.】

item.title: 比亚迪港股较岸股溢价创新高
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司的股价在香港创下历史新高，与在内地交易的股票相比，溢价率达到历史最高水平。【原文：BYD Co.’s shares rose to a record high in Hong Kong, expanding their premium over those trading on the mainland to the highest level ever.】

item.title: 南非仲裁员建议增加薪酬以避免物流罢工
item.description: 一位第三方仲裁人向南非国有港口和铁路公司及其工会提出了更高的工资提议，以避免数千名物流工人可能举行的罢工。【原文：A third-party arbiter proposed a higher wage offer to South Africa’s state-owned ports and rail company and its unions in a bid to stave off a potential strike by thousands of logistics workers.】

item.title: 中国当局在走私调查中讯问金属企业老板
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国政府已对国内一些主要金属商和生产商的负责人进行了质询，以加大打击重要矿产品走私的力度。【原文：Chinese authorities have questioned the heads of some of the country’s leading metals merchants and producers as part of an intensifying effort to crack down on critical-minerals smuggling, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官敦促美国降低进入 500 亿美元中国市场的门槛
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋呼吁美国放宽对中国出口人工智能技术的限制，否则就有可能将数十亿美元的收入拱手让给华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：Nvidia Corp. chief Jensen Huang called on the US to ease restrictions on the export of AI technology to China, or risk losing out on billions of dollars in revenue to up-and-coming rivals such as Huawei Technologies Co.】

item.title: 全球液化天然气供应商打赌中国需求下滑稍纵即逝
item.description: 全球天然气巨头都在打赌，中国目前的需求低迷只是暂时的，中国将在未来几年支撑他们数十亿美元的投资。【原文：Global gas giants are betting the current lull in Chinese demand is temporary, and that the country will underpin their multibillion-dollar investments for years to come.】

item.title: 绿树之后，CATL 香港上市募集资金增至 52 亿美元
item.description: 当代安派科技有限公司（Amperex Technology Co.在交易安排人行使所谓的 "绿鞋"（greenshoe）选择权增发股票后，安培瑞斯科技有限公司的香港股票销售募集到了 410 亿港元（52 亿美元）的资金，从而使这一今年全球最大的上市项目规模更大。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. has raised HK$41 billion ($5.2 billion) for its Hong Kong share sale after arrangers of the deal exercised the so-called greenshoe option to increase the offering, making the world’s biggest listing this year even bigger.】

item.title: 亚洲病例激增，Covid 检测需求激增
item.description: 据诊断试剂盒制造商Phase Scientific International Ltd.的高层管理人员称，由于最近几周病例激增，香港对Covid检测的需求正在增加。【原文：Demand for Covid tests is increasing in Hong Kong as cases surge in recent weeks, according to the top executive of diagnostic kit-maker Phase Scientific International Ltd.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利策略师称 "买美国，不买美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）上调了对美国股市和国债的看涨预期，因为市场预期美联储未来的一系列降息措施将支持债券并提振公司盈利。【原文：Morgan Stanley has raised its call on US stocks and Treasuries on expectations that a slew of future interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve will support bonds and boost company earnings.】
